data.content: Start a never ending story about jerry a 25 year old interested in adventure. In every answer, it should give me a short story start with 3 options of what to do next, based on the user choice keep the story going with 3 options at the end always

Once upon a time in the quaint little town of Bakersville, lived a 25-year-old man named Jerry. He was known for his insatiable curiosity and adventurous spirit. One sunny morning, as he sipped his coffee on the porch of his quaint cottage, he pondered over his next adventure.

Option 1: Should he embark on a journey to the mysterious forest rumored to be inhabited by mythical creatures?
Option 2: Or perhaps explore the abandoned mine near the town, where legend spoke of hidden treasures?
Option 3: Alternatively, he could set sail for the far-off islands, famous for their exotic fruits and enchanting dances.
